column4: RPT-Automakers race to double the driving range of affordable electric cars
column5: DETROIT  March 24 Global automakers are readying a new generation of mass-market electric cars with more than double the driving range of today's Nissan Leaf  betting that technical breakthroughs by big battery suppliers such as LG Chem Ltd will jump-start demand and pull them abreast of Tesla Motors Inc.

column4: THAILAND PRESS-Intel to support govt's digital economy plan - The Nation
column5: Intel has announced its support for the government's "digital economy" strategy through its technologies and knowledge  the Nation reported  citing Intel Southeast Asia's director of public policy  Worapat Patram.
